description: This file defines the implementation of the HttpClient class, including methods for initializing the curl library, downloading files with rate limiting, and handling progress and data write callbacks.

classes.name: HttpClient
classes.description: A class providing HTTP download functionality using libcurl, including methods for downloading files, managing progress, and handling callbacks.

methods.name: HttpClient::HttpClient
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the curl handle.

methods.name: HttpClient::~HttpClient
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up the curl handle.

methods.name: HttpClient::downloadFile
methods.description: Downloads a file from a given URL and saves it to a specified filename, with optional rate limiting.

methods.name: HttpClient::progressCb
methods.description: Callback function for tracking download progress.

methods.name: HttpClient::write_data
methods.description: Callback function for writing downloaded data to a file.

methods.name: HttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)

ctags.name: downloadFile
ctags.pattern: /^HttpClient::downloadFile(const std::string & url, const std::string & fileName, uint32_t rateLim/

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ul/

ctags.name: write_data
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE *stream) {$/
